import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import plotly.express as px
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
source.023ecf5d:
topvalue = df.groupby('Industry')[['Industry','Valuation']].sum().sort_values(by='Valuation',ascending=False)[:10]
fig = px.bar(x = [i for i in topvalue.index],y = [i for i in topvalue['Valuation']],color = [i for i in topvalue.index],template= 'plotly_dark')
fig.update_layout(xaxis_title = 'Industries',yaxis_title = 'Valuation($)',title = 'Distribution based on Top 10 Largest Valuation Industries')
source.a6c0d00e:
leastvalue = df.groupby('Industry')[['Industry','Valuation']].sum().sort_values(by='Valuation',ascending=True)[:10]
fig = px.bar(x = [i for i in leastvalue.index],y = [i for i in leastvalue['Valuation']],color = [i for i in leastvalue.index],template= 'plotly_dark')
fig.update_layout(xaxis_title = 'Industries',yaxis_title = 'Valuation($)',title = 'Distribution based on Top 10 Least Valuation Industries')
source.0861a278:
topcountries = df.groupby('Country')[['Country','Valuation']].sum().sort_values(by='Valuation',ascending=False)[:10]
fig = px.bar(x = [i for i in topcountries.index],y = [i for i in topcountries['Valuation']],color = [i for i in topcountries.index],template= 'plotly_dark')
fig.update_layout(xaxis_title = 'Industries',yaxis_title = 'Valuation($)',title = 'Distribution based on Top 10 Largest Valuation Countries')
source.6d3d5ce5:
leastcountries = df.groupby('Country')[['Country','Valuation']].sum().sort_values(by='Valuation',ascending=True)[:10]
fig = px.bar(x = [i for i in leastcountries.index],y = [i for i in leastcountries['Valuation']],color = [i for i in leastcountries.index],template= 'plotly_dark')
fig.update_layout(xaxis_title = 'Industries',yaxis_title = 'Valuation($)',title = 'Distribution based on Top 10 Least Valuation Countries')
source.273fc036:
from collections import Counter
strtups = Counter(df.Industry)
moststrtups = sorted(strtups.items(),key=(lambda x: x[1]),reverse=True)[:10]
fig = px.bar(x = [i[0] for i in moststrtups],y = [i[1] for i in moststrtups],color = [i[0] for i in moststrtups],template= 'plotly_dark')
fig.update_layout(xaxis_title = 'Country',yaxis_title = 'Count',title = 'Distribution based on Top 10 Most Startup Companies')
